text: (Ci ʙadraftori ast dar pajmonsikanii ʙani Isroil!) Har ʙor ki ʙo Alloh pajmone ʙastand, guruhe az eson pajmonsikani kardand. Pas ononro meʙini, ki imruz ahd meʙandand va fardo ahd mesikanand, ʙalki ʙestarason (ʙa on ci ki Pajomʙari Alloh Muhammad (sallallohu alajhi va sallam) ovardaast,) ʙovar namekunand
